name: hadoop.registry.zk.retry.times
description: Zookeeper connection retry count before failing

name: dfs.namenode.blocks.per.postponedblocks.rescan
description:
Number of blocks to rescan for each iteration of
    postponedMisreplicatedBlocks.

name: dfs.datanode.max.transfer.threads
description:
Specifies the maximum number of threads to use for transferring data
        in and out of the DN.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-xattr-size
description:
The maximum combined size of the name and value of an extended attribute
    in bytes. It should be larger than 0, and less than or equal to maximum
    size hard limit which is 32768.
    Support multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described in
    dfs.blocksize.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.encrypted.key.cache.size
description: Size of the EncryptedKeyVersion cache Queue for each key

name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: fs.s3a.socket.send.buffer
description: Socket send buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.
